Posts.EditableText: hi, when i add a youtube videos the program ask about flash player plugin for internet explorer but it is installed and enabled, can someone help me? is there a way to use local files for videos? thanks

Posts.EditableText: You can't use localised video files afaik. I'm going to attempt to work around this by turning a short movie clip into a gif and triggering the audio simultaneously. No idea about the flash issue. is it in the online or offline game browser?
Posts.HTML: You can't use localised video files afaik. I'm going to attempt to work around this by turning a short movie clip into a gif and triggering the audio simultaneously. No idea about the flash issue. is it in the online or offline game browser?
